gear.name: Muffin tin or ice cream cone holder

cookingTips: Prepare cake batter according to package directions; fill cones only 2/3 full to prevent overflow
Stand cones upright in muffin tin during baking for stability and even cooking
Frost and sprinkle immediately after cones cool slightly so frosting adheres better
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide on baking cupcakes inside cones and decorating for a fun, edible treat that combines cake, frosting, and cone.
